p: Although hiPSC-derived NSCs, neurons and brain organoids have been extensively used to investigate ZIKV neural tropism and pathogenesis in comparison with other flaviviruses [ 14, 15, 16, 17, 19, 21, 23, 24], a novelty of this study is the detailed investigation and comparison of the effects of different flaviviruses on hiPSCs, NSCs, and neurons. Three representative flaviviruses associated with human disease—i.e., ZIKV, WNV, and DENV—were chosen for experiments.
